Description: Accumulation constant for fractional snow covered area
Turbulent transfer coefficient between canopy surface and canopy air
Category: Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes
Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes

Description: Fraction of biomass that is water
Decay factor for fractional saturated area
Fraction of saturated soil for moisture value at which DSL initiates
Category: Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes

Description: fraction of carbon available for N fixation
the baseline proportion of nitrogen allocated for electron transport (J)
determines response of electron transport rate to light availability
Maximum storage of liquid water on leaf surface
Maximum fraction of leaf that may be wet prior to drip occuring
Stem number; number of individuals per meter squared (similar to stocking number) [#/m2]
Resistance of stems to heat transfer per dbh [s/m/m]
Upper lim. for snow densification through desctructive metamorphism
the baseline ratio of rubisco limited rate vs light limited photosynthetic rate (Wc:Wj)
Lower limit on wind speed at the forcing height
Category: Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes

Description: Reference wind above which frsh snow density is (substantially) increased.
Ratio of momentum roughness length to canopy top height
Category: Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes

Description: Max value zeta ("height" used in Monin-Obukhov theory) can go to under stable conditions. Setting this value prevents the surface from becoming too stable at night, which suppresses mixing and contributes to cold nighttime temperature bias.
Category: Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes

Description: Momentum roughness length for soils, glacier, wetland
Category: Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes
Sensible, latent heat, and momentum fluxes
